main.connection

Class InternalFileConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.connection.Connection
      • main.connection.FileConnection
        • main.connection.InternalFileConnection

  • public class InternalFileConnection
extends FileConnection
    This class provides all the methods that an node belonging to the Chord ring may call in order to download, upload and delete one or more files stored in the Chord ring.
    Author:
    Martini Davide Distributed Systems class (AY 2017/2018), University of Padua, Master's degree in Computer Engineering.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class main.connection.Connection

        nodeAddress, ois, oos, s

      boolean deleteFileRequest(java.lang.String fileName)
      This method is called to remove a file form an internal node.

      This method is called to request multiple file deletion from the contact node.

      • InternalFileConnection

        public InternalFileConnection(InternalNode n,
                              java.net.InetSocketAddress nodeAd)
        Unique constructor for the class
        Parameters:

        nodeAd - The address to contact the node

    • Method Detail

      • getFileRequest

        public boolean getFileRequest(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method is called to get a file form an internal node. It wraps the superclass getFileRequest() method
        Overrides:
        getFileRequest in class FileConnection
        Parameters:
        fileName - It is the desired file name
        Returns:
        True if the operation is performed correctly

      • fileIntervalRequest

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fileIntervalRequest(java.math.BigInteger from,
                                                                 java.math.BigInteger to)
        This method is called to request a set of files whose id belongs to a given interval
        Parameters:
        from - It represents the beginning of the interval
        to - It represents the end of the interval
        Returns:
        True if the operation is performed correctly

      • insertFileRequest

        public boolean insertFileRequest(java.lang.String fileName)

        Overrides:
        insertFileRequest in class FileConnection
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • deleteFileRequest

        public boolean deleteFileRequest(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method is called to remove a file form an internal node. It wraps the superclass deleteFileRequest() method
        Overrides:
        deleteFileRequest in class FileConnection
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • deleteFilesRequest

        public boolean deleteFilesRequest(java.math.BigInteger from,
                                  java.math.BigInteger to)
        This method is called to request multiple file deletion from the contact node. Files to be removed have ids which belong to a given interval
        Parameters:
        from - It represents the beginning of the interval
        to - It represents the end of the interval
        Returns:
        True if the operation is performed correctly
